Rockslp.balance: Fixes daggers actually now the correct damage value.

Rockslp.code_imp: Cleans up the weapon code a bit.

Somniworld.balance: Lowered the prices of all inquisition clothing in their HERMES reliquary.\nqol : Lifeblood and Mana potions are now clearly called exactly that in the inquisitorial reliquary.

realforest2001.bugfix: Fixed Xylix worshippers needing an amulet of Ravox to pray.
FIxed iconstate name for lord rapier sheathe icons.
Fixed Knave Bandit not spawning with Quiver.

realforest2001.qol: Improved flight interactions. You cannot take off with a roof over your head.
Stopping-Flying whilst stood directly on a turf will now be instant.

realforest2001.sound: Added a wingflap to taking off and landing.

realforest2001.rscadd: add: Made the vampire progeny tip change depending on if you can or can't rise more.
Vampires can now tell the difference between Vampire Spawn, Vampires and Wretch Vampires on examine.

realforest2001.code_imp: Fixed a variable typo for clan covens.

realforest2001.bugfix: Fixed Vampire Spawn not having their own icon as they expected.
Fixed being able to spawn as a vampire when playing churchling.

snowyseshi.rscadd: hollow curse ritual checks if the target is dead, hollow ritual checks if target has lux

CheffieGithub.refactor: refactored click code to pass param lists directly, report any click issues

realforest2001.bugfix: Blowing a kiss no longer reveals sneaking people.

PotatoTomahto.refactor: skill levels can now be decimals

Rockslp.code_imp: Changed some item descriptions to remove mentions of Lakkari and Kaledon

realforest2001.rscadd: Outsiders making a meister account no longer reveal their role to the steward.

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Dodge no longer always succeeds if show_rolls is disabled

realforest2001.bugfix: Fixed Blood Rites being selectable when they don't function.
Fixed Vampire Lord, VL and Werewolf, and Werewolf triggering on Voyage.
Fixes the duplicate description of the leather coat.
Fixed Wretch Bloodsuckers not getting the right antag datum.
Fixed church roles not being able to unlock/lock the pillory they have.
Fixed the Inquisition black bag eating head gear.

realforest2001.admin: Hearing Speech, Whispers and seeing Emotes as aghost are now independent buttons and save through rounds.
Making an announcement from the gods can now be \"tested\" without sending to the whole server.
Astrata, Xylix, Zizo, Graggar, Matthios and Baotha omen sounds can now be used in announcements.
Moved some verbs around to be easier to find and work out what they are.
LOOC will now be distinct if relayed via admin powers vs local hearing. (R) LOOC.
Ahelps are now in red for the chat window, this was prior intended for part of the message but wasn't being applied.
Added an audio cue and distinct chat format for prayers.
Rebuilt Subtle Message to allow for easy messages from the gods.
Added thematic pre-messages for the main 14 gods, courtesy of Vispectra.
Added a feedback message for toggling the context menu.

Casperclone1.bugfix: Fixed explosives not being extinguished in water
Crafting explosives should no longer explode when making them, such as deathshells

Casperclone1.balance: deathshells have a 25% to not explode when ignited as the original PR wanted them to have a drawback for being cheaply produced

PotatoTomahto.rscdel: You can see see types without the trait, trait gives crop information

realforest2001.bugfix: People no longer have buttons they shouldn't.

realforest2001.admin: Admins can now force the subclass menu to trigger for players.

Siro.rscadd: Adds hair: Bedhead v4, Blunt Bangs and its alternate, Cornrows, Cornrows 2, Cornrow Braid, Cornrow Bun, Cornrow Tail, Hornet, and Viper.

flleeppyy.rscadd: Added relay chooser (Named \"Internet Routing Relays\" at the top of the window) ported from IrisStation

PatapoIIIa.refactor: unified grass and bush foraging logic into a shared search loop

PatapoIIIa.code_imp: removed recursive do_after usage from bush interactions

PatapoIIIa.bugfix: prevented repeated loot duplication during bush replenishment

PatapoIIIa.qol: standardized loot generation across bush, swampweed, and pyroclastic flowers

Ordosian.image: Updated Volf sprites and color variants.

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Fixed lack of PER on the stat panel.
Alt click turf menu allows allow interaction

CheffieGithub.rscadd: Round end timer to stat panel.

realforest2001.bugfix: Fixes missing time references on the statpanel.

realforest2001.admin: Moved Manage Paintings to GameMaster tab.

realforest2001.bugfix: Fixed a missing reference in returning to lobby.

ModDownloading.rscadd: The Packmule quirk, costs 8 points and lets you start with a Backpack.
The Ugly quirk, costs nothing and makes you ugly.

ModDownloading.rscdel: The Night Vision quirk, as it did nothing due to how the lighting system works.

TerraGS.qol: Using a wood or copper hammer on an artificer table won't generate sparks.

Teoti4001.rscadd: Polymorph attunement can be suplimented with Chaos essence in the essence gauntlet

CheffieGithub.rscadd: Added culture customisation, seperated it from skin colours where applicable.

realforest2001.rscadd: Added the ability to make people your acquaintance, adding them to your list of known people.
You now automatically know people who are in your family.
Middle click on the health heart is now used when next to someone to share identities. Right click is still used to check who you know.
Added the decorated dagger to Monarch.

Cheffie, Absolucy, jlsnow301, Bisar, MTa.rscadd: Added a loot window for alt-clicking tiles.

Cheffie, Absolucy, jlsnow301, Bisar, MTa.rscdel: Removed the item browser from the stat panel.

Wrench-1.rscadd: Remembrance, a Psydonian Longsword Relic for Ordinator and Inspector

Wrench-1.rscdel: Removed the Forgotten Blade from being able to be selected by Ordinator and Inspector

snowyseshi.image: added astratan cross and golden astratan cross

snowyseshi.code_imp: moved psycross and astratan cross to structure.dm and make them use crafting instead of carpentry

Casperclone1.bugfix: Fixed Kobold not having a accent

CheffieGithub.rscadd: Seasonal triumph buys, which last for exactly how long a season lasts, they will stay on your account until the time you bought it + the wipe time. I.e. 3 months exactly if a season was 3 months.
These Triumph buys will be disabled until the next season.
Enabled triumph subspecies triumph buys. Get grinding.

KevinfromHP.rscadd: Monarchs receive bonus triumphs roundstart with lowpop.

KevinfromHP.refactor: Reworked the Advclass triumph buy because the special queue was actually nonsense. Why the hell was it used

KevinfromHP.balance: Rebalanced advanced class restriction triumph buy

tired-wired.rscadd: Added new psydonic, a grenzel language

tired-wired.rscdel: Removed old psydonic from most non-inquisition roles

MrTCo1.rscadd: Templaric Order lore blurb in the Primer (Aberra Approved)

Rockslp.balance: Blacksmiths have a chance at legendary skills, 5%

Rockslp.map: Armorsmith+weaponsmith spawns replaced with blacksmith spawns.
